arabicText: وَهَٰذَا صِرَاطِي مُسْتَقِيمًا فَٱتَّبِعُوهُ وَلَا تَتَّبِعُوا السُّبُلَ فَتَفَرَّقَ بِكُمْ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦ ۚ ذَٰلِكُمْ وَصَّىٰكُم بِهِۦ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَتَّقُونَ
translationText: And this is My path, which is straight, so follow it; and do not follow [other] ways, for you will be separated from His way. This has He instructed you that you may become righteous.

arabicText: وَنَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْكَ الْكِتَابَ تِبْيَانًا لِّكُلِّ شَيْءٍ وَهُدًى وَرَحْمَةً وَبُشْرَىٰ لِلْمُسْلِمِينَ
translationText: And We have revealed to you the Book as clarification for all things and as guidance and mercy and good tidings for the Muslims.

arabicText: إِنَّ هَٰذَا الْقُرْآنَ يَهْدِي لِلَّتِي هِيَ أَقْوَمُ
translationText: Indeed, this Qur’an guides to that which is most suitable.

arabicText: فَمَنِ ٱهْتَدَىٰ فَإِنَّمَا يَهْتَدِي لِنَفْسِهِۦ وَمَن ضَلَّ فَقُلْ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۟ مِنَ ٱلْمُنذِرِينَ
translationText: So whoever is guided is only guided for [the benefit of] himself; and whoever goes astray only goes astray to his own loss. And you are not a manager over them.

arabicText: وَإِذَا سَأَلَكَ عِبَادِي عَنِّي فَإِنِّي قَرِيبٌۭ أُجِيبُ دَعْوَةَ ٱلدَّاعِ إِذَا دَعَانِ
translationText: And when My servants ask you concerning Me, indeed I am near. I respond to the invocation of the supplicant when he calls upon Me.

arabicText: وَٱتَّقُوا ٱللَّهَ وَيُعَلِّمُكُمُ ٱللَّهُ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمٌۭ
translationText: And fear Allah. And Allah teaches you. And Allah is Knowing of all things.
